description: This service allows HR Managers to setup new Employees within the organization. HR Managers should use this service to setup the user in the appropriate systems, order business cards, and setup their workspaces.
name: Employee Onboarding

elements.name: Header
elements.title: Please enter the new employees information

events.name: Lookup City / State
Set Defaults
Change - Employee Role
Sort Office Telephone Numbers

elements.name: BusinessCard Preview

pattern.message: Please use valid zip code format  (12345 OR 12345-6789 OR 12345 1234)

elements.name: Availability Back Order
elements.text: This system is on back order.

elements.name: Availability In Stock
elements.text: This system is in stock.

events.name: Set User Spec Document View
Set User Spec Document View

elements.name: Banner Note
elements.text: NOTE! Only Directors and Managers get BMW's. Everyone else gets a Fiesta.

elements.name: Confirmation Text
elements.text:
Thanks for your request. We'll get to work on it right away. 

You will be notified with a status update throughout the process.
